item.description:
We will meet at D'Angelo's at 10AM. Anyone who arrives early can wave a sign right there on the corner. IT's a very busy road. We'll wave signs until everyone shows up.

We will go door to door along pre-planned routes and make sure that the Manchester Republicans know who to vote for.

Bring DVDs, Slim Jims, handouts, etc. There is no better way to reach a person than face to face.


See you there!
item.why: Last week we secured sign locations on two of the main traffic arteries. Come and help us spread the message and locate premium sign locations.
item.name: Canvassing Manchester, CT Part II
